listitem.para: Turns on networking in &PRODUCTNAME;. This must be called before any other network commands will work.

If the synchronous_dns input is not given, &PRODUCTNAME; uses asynchronous DNS. You may optionally call NETSTARTUP with the synchronous_dns input as 0 (asynchronous) or 1 (synchronous). Synchronous DNS makes &PRODUCTNAME; unresponsive during a network name lookup. Support for synchronous DNS was added to work around "Host not Found" errors with Trumpet WinSock in the early 1990s. It should not be needed today.
